name: Programming Languages
description: A collection of programming languages i have learned

itemListElement.name: HTML
itemListElement.description: HTML (Hypertext Markup Language) is a markup language used to create the structure and content of web pages.
itemListElement.keywords: HTML, Hypertext Markup Language, Web Development

itemListElement.name: CSS
itemListElement.description: CSS (Cascading Style Sheets) is a styling language used to describe the presentation of a document written in HTML or XML.
itemListElement.keywords: CSS, Cascading Style Sheets, Styling Language, Web Development

itemListElement.name: SCSS
itemListElement.description: SCSS (Sassy CSS) is a preprocessor scripting language that is a superset of CSS, adding features such as variables, mixins, and nesting.
itemListElement.keywords: SCSS, Sassy CSS, Styling Language, Web Development

itemListElement.name: JavaScript
itemListElement.description: JavaScript is a high-level, object-oriented programming language used to create interactive effects within web browsers.
itemListElement.keywords: JavaScript, JS, Programming Language, Web Development

itemListElement.name: TypeScript
itemListElement.description: TypeScript is a typed superset of JavaScript that compiles to plain JavaScript.
itemListElement.keywords: TypeScript, TS, Programming Language, Web Development

itemListElement.name: PHP
itemListElement.description: PHP (Hypertext Preprocessor) is a server-side scripting language used to create dynamic web pages.
itemListElement.keywords: PHP, Hypertext Preprocessor, Programming Language, Web Development

itemListElement.name: Java
itemListElement.description: Java is a class-based, object-oriented programming language designed to have as few implementation dependencies as possible.
itemListElement.keywords: Java, Java SE, Programming Language, Software Development

itemListElement.name: Python
itemListElement.description: Python is a high-level, interpreted programming language that emphasizes code readability and ease of use.
itemListElement.keywords: Python, Python 3, Programming Language, Software Development

itemListElement.name: MySQL
itemListElement.description: MySQL is a popular open-source relational database management system.
itemListElement.keywords: MySQL, Structured Query Language, Database Management System, Software Development

itemListElement.name: C#
itemListElement.description: C# is a modern, multi-paradigm programming language created by Microsoft.
itemListElement.keywords: C#, C Sharp, Programming Language, Software Development

itemListElement.name: Bash
itemListElement.description: Bash is a shell program for Unix-like operating systems that allows users to enter commands to interact with the operating system.
itemListElement.keywords: Bash, Shell, Command Line Interface, CLI, Unix-like

itemListElement.name: FreeMarker
itemListElement.description: FreeMarker is a template engine that enables the creation of dynamic web pages by generating text output based on templates.

itemListElement.name: PostgreSQL
itemListElement.description: PostgreSQL is a powerful open-source relational database management system.
itemListElement.keywords: PostgreSQL, Postgres, Structured Query Language, Database Management System, Software Development
